results.name: First differences of the average of two consecutive primes (A024675).
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Differences@ ListConvolve[{1, 1}/2, Prime@ Range[2, 120]] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 17 2016, after _Jean-François Alcover_ at A024675 *)
